tags.name: kemet-scroll-snap
tags.description: A scroll-snap implementation for responsive sliders.

properties.name: axis
properties.description: Determines the direction the component flows. Values include: (horizontal|vertical)

properties.name: pagination
properties.description: Detrmines where to display the paginator. Values include: (top|right|bottom|left)

properties.name: isTouchDevice
properties.description: Is set if touch capibilities are detected.

properties.name: slides
properties.description: An array of objects containing info about the slides.

events.name: kemet-scroll-snap-make-slides
events.description: Fires when slide data has been created.

slots.name: pagination
slots.description: Place the paginator component here if you want one.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-gap
cssProperties.description: Space between the slides. Default is: 0.

properties.name: focused
properties.description: Is true when the slide is fully visible in it's container.

cssProperties.name: --kememt-scroll-snap-slide-width
cssProperties.description: The width of the slide. Default is: 100%.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-slide-align
cssProperties.description: The scroll-snap alignment. Default is: center.

tags.name: kemet-scroll-snap-paginator
tags.description: A paginator for the scroll snap component.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: A character icon used for each page in the pagination iterator.

properties.name: useNumberPages
properties.description: If set to true, the pages in the pagination iterator will appear as a set of numbers.

properties.name: useLabelPages
properties.description: If set to true, the pages in the pagination iterator will appear as the label set on the slide.

events.name: kemet-scroll-snap-focus
events.description: Fires when a set of slides are focused on.
